definition: nonsyllabic final r 儿 added to a word in spoken Chinese/also called retroflex final or r-ization
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
retroflex final/nonsyllabic final r 儿 added to a word in spoken Chinese

sentences.english: Retroflex suffixation in Chinese is a phenomenon of syllable merger.
sentences.chinese: 漢語兒化是一種音節融合現象。

sentences.english: The son is Chinese unique language phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 兒化是漢語獨特的語言現象。

sentences.english: Retroflex suffixation of place names is a very common phenomenon in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京地名的兒化現象十分普遍。

definition: to make a fool of oneself
falling intonation (linguistics)/to lower the key of a tune/to demote
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
